Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Application no. 20015008 TCX, pursuant to §20-225 of the Administrative Code of the City of New York, concerning the petition of Clirkat Donuts, Inc., d/b/a Angelo's Donuts, to establish and operate an enclosed sidewalk café located at 2942-44 Westchester Avenue, Borough of the Bronx, Council District no. 13.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to Rule 11.20b of the Council and §20-225(g) of the New York City Administrative Code.
